texto: 10005 was prepared by Technical Committee ISO/TC 176, Quality management and quality assurance, Subcommittee SC 2, Quality systems. This second edition cancels and replaces the first edition (ISO 10005:1995). It constitutes a technical revision of that edition, taking into account ISO 9000:2000, ISO 9001:2000 and ISO 9004:2000. iv © ISO 2005 – All rights reserved ISO 10005:2005(E) ON-Download - Service, 11.11.2005, 856867-2, Quality Austria Trainings-, Zertifizierungs- und Begutachtungs GmbH, Gonzagagasse 1/24, A-1010 Wien Introduction This International Standard was prepared to address the need for guidance on quality plans, either in the context of an established quality management system
